front.title: The Continuous Media Markup Language (CMML), Version 2.1

abstract.t: This specification defines the Continuous Media Markup Language(CMML), version 2.1, an XML-based [1] markup language for time-continuous data. It is a sister document to the specification of theAnnodex [2] annotation, indexing and hyperlinking format for time-continuous data. A CMML file is essentially a textual representationof an Annodex file.
